title: Our Sins in Blood
description:
Ever since I was little, I've been a prisoner.
They told me I was sickly, that going outside would kill me. But the truth comes out when I'm kidnapped by four dark, sinfully gorgeous vampire princes. Turns out, I am the biological daughter of their maker, the vampire king.I am the heir to the throne. Me, the girl who hasn't danced in the rain or gone to prom or even been kissed.But I can only take up the role on one condition. I have to choose one of the princes to be my mate and king.The problem?All four are vying for the throne and it's hard to say who wants me for my blood, my body, my love, or my birthright.What ensues is a dark and dangerous game of seduction, secrets, and bloody love in the Coven of Sin.
author: Aiden Pierce
